summary: Zaven Kaprielian is an Assistant Professor of Pathology/Neuroscience at the Albert Einstein College of Medicine in New York City. He is the author of the book ‘Theory of Neurobiology’. His research has been published in the journals Neurophysiology, Neurosurgery, and Neurotoxicology.
